nodes.description: 1998年8月7日，美国驻肯尼亚内罗毕使馆遭汽车炸弹袭击，造成250人死亡，1000人受伤
nodes.support_text: This bombing follows an earlier attack on the US embassy in the Kenyan capital Nairobi in 1998. That bomb killed 250 people and maimed a further 1,000, mostly Kenyans.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，肯尼亚莫巴萨以色列 owned天堂酒店遭自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，并伴随以色列客机导弹攻击未遂
nodes.support_text: US and Israeli sources have pointed the finger of blame at Al Qaeda for the November 28 bombing of the Israeli-owned Paradise Hotel in Mombassa, Kenya and the attempted missile attack on an Israeli passenger jet laden with returning Israeli holidaymakers.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，以色列贝特谢安Likud党总部遭枪击事件，造成6人死亡，43人受伤
nodes.support_text: The Mombassa bombing coincided with a gun attack on a Likud party office in Beit She’an, Israel the same day where primary elections were being held to select a new leader for the party.

nodes.description: 2002年11月29日，Al Qaeda通过互联网网站宣称对莫巴萨袭击负责
nodes.support_text: The Monday after the attack a message appeared on an Islamist Internet site, purportedly from Al Qaeda, claiming responsibility for the Mombassa attacks.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，以色列客机在起飞时遭遇导弹攻击，未受损伤
nodes.support_text: Some 20 minutes previously an Arika Airlines Boeing 757-300 reported that missiles had been fired at it as it took off from Mombassa en route for Tel Aviv.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，肯尼亚警方从现场回收两枚未使用的萨姆-7导弹
nodes.support_text: Police later recovered two unused Sam 7 missiles from the scene.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，以色列总理沙龙通过安全会议调整选举策略，最终赢得 Likud党领袖选举
nodes.support_text: Right up until the afternoon of November 28, Sharon seems to have thought that a low turnout threatened his position and that Netanyahu would win.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，英国、澳大利亚等政府提前发布肯尼亚恐怖袭击预警，但以色列政府否认收到相关情报
nodes.support_text: warnings had appeared on the Internet. “Militant groups who sympathise with Al Qaeda warned one week ago that there would be an attack on Kenya and they mentioned Israelis,” he said.

nodes.description: 2002年12月2日，以色列军方承认曾收到肯尼亚威胁情报但未采取行动
nodes.support_text: But four days after the blast, Brigadier-General Yossi Kuperwasser admitted that the Israeli military intelligence were aware of a threat in Kenya.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，德国空军在莫巴萨附近海域加强军事巡逻
nodes.support_text: Meanwhile the German air force is patrolling the skies off Mombassa monitoring all shipping between Kenya, Somalia and Pakistan.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，美国在非洲东海岸建立多个军事基地，包括莫巴萨机场
nodes.support_text: US military personnel even have a base at Mombassa airport, where they are said to provide “logistical support” to Kenyan security forces.

nodes.description: 2002年11月28日，美国指控索马里Al Ittihad al Islamiya组织与基地组织关联，但缺乏直接证据
nodes.support_text: US forces are currently engaged in exercises with the Kenyan military north of Mombassa, codenamed Edged Mallet.

edges.support_text: This bombing follows an earlier attack on the US embassy in the Kenyan capital Nairobi in 1998.
The Mombassa bombing coincided with a gun attack on a Likud party office in Beit She’an, Israel the same day where primary elections were being held to select a new leader for the party.
The Monday after the attack a message appeared on an Islamist Internet site, purportedly from Al Qaeda, claiming responsibility for the Mombassa attacks.
Police later recovered two unused Sam 7 missiles from the scene.
Right up until the afternoon of November 28, Sharon seems to have thought that a low turnout threatened his position and that Netanyahu would win.
But four days after the blast, Brigadier-General Yossi Kuperwasser admitted that the Israeli military intelligence were aware of a threat in Kenya.
Meanwhile the German air force is patrolling the skies off Mombassa monitoring all shipping between Kenya, Somalia and Pakistan.
US military personnel even have a base at Mombassa airport, where they are said to provide “logistical support” to Kenyan security forces.
US forces are currently engaged in exercises with the Kenyan military north of Mombassa, codenamed Edged Mallet.

Some 20 minutes previously an Arika Airlines Boeing 757-300 reported that missiles had been fired at it as it took off from Mombassa en route for Tel Aviv.
warnings had appeared on the Internet. “Militant groups who sympathise with Al Qaeda warned one week ago that there would be an attack on Kenya and they mentioned Israelis,” he said.
